text: The Girls () is a 1961 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Yuri Chulyukin.Путин поздравил режиссёра Светлану Дружинину с юбилеемДевчата It stars Nadezhda Rumyantseva, Nikolai Rybnikov, and Lyusyena Ovchinnikova. ==Actors== * Nadezhda Rumyantseva as Tosya * Nikolai Rybnikov as Ilya * Lyusyena Ovchinnikova as Katya * Stanislav Khitrov as Filya * Inna Makarova as Nadya * Svetlana Druzhinina as Anfisa * Nina Menshikova as Vera == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1961 movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Girls (1961 movie)
